# url

**Instance Property**

The URL of a type checking result.

## Declaration

```swift
var url: URL? { get }
```

## Text Checking Results for URLs

- **linkCheckingResult(range:url:)**: Creates and returns a text checking result with the specified URL.

items.description: Creates and returns a text checking result with the specified URL.
